content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: white_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 51, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 40, "index": 17}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 35, "index": 19}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 20, "index": 20}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "green_carpet", "quantity": 28, "index": 39}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft white_stained_glass, I need to craft white_dye. To do so, I need to place 1 lily_of_the_valley in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the lily_of_the_valley from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 51, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 40, "index": 17}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 35, "index": 19}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 20, "index": 20}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_carpet", "quantity": 28, "index": 39}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the white_dye by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 51, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 40, "index": 17}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 35, "index": 19}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 20, "index": 20}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_carpet", "quantity": 28, "index": 39}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a white stained glass, I first need to make glass. Glass can be made by smelting sand in the furnace. There is sand at slot 40, so I will move one sand to the smelting input slot (13) to smelt it into glass.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 40 to slot 13 with quantity 1
